extendedInfo.description: A SCREENSHOT APP THAT DOESN'T REQUIRE ROOTNo Root Screenshot It is an application that lets you take screenshots of your phone. This application works on ALL phones. Root is NOT required.Take screenshots of any screen on your phone!This application is for those users who need to take screenshots, but don't have root access to their phones.PLEASE READ CAREFULLY BEFORE INSTALLING:This application will instruct you to download and install a free desktop application on your Windows or Mac. Once installed, you must run the desktop application with your phone attached to your computer. This will enable screenshots on your phone. Once you've done this, you can disconnect your phone and take screenshots whenever you want. However, every time you restart your phone, you'll have to connect it to your computer and run the desktop application again. If you restart your phone frequently, this app may not be for you, as it may prove to be too inconvenient. Your phone will NOT be rooted or temp-rooted in any way. No system files on your phone will be altered.  If your phone is already rooted, please download the normal "Screenshot It" application from the Android market.FEATURES: - Take a screenshot of your phone's screen- Save as a jpg or png file and share anywhere- Crop screenshots- Annotate and draw on screenshots- Screen shot status bar button- Screenshot widget button- Shake to screen shot- Delayed screenshot timer- "Share" menu integration- Custom save directory- Overlay phone information on screenshots- Works on ALL devicesPlease exclude this app from any task killer or anti-virus software on your phone. If you don't, you'll have to run the enabler more often.Tags: Screenshot, screen shot, screen capture, no root

reviews.title: Works Great!
reviews.comment: I love this app!!! It\'s so easy to use and if you can\'t figure it out, they are super willing to help you out and make it fool proof.
reviews.author: Kayla Banner

reviews.title: Motorola Droid-works incredibly well
reviews.comment: I always wanted a screenshot for my android but did NOT want to root my phone. I recommend this app to any android user. Worth the money. INSTALLATION NOT DIFFICULT. Works perfectly, couldn\'t be better.
reviews.author: Casey Paul

reviews.title: Fantastic app!!!
reviews.comment: I LOVE this app!!  I don\'t want to fool with rooting my phone, but I need to take screenshots.  This app is a life saver, and SO easy to install and use.  Thank you for a great app!!
reviews.author: Michael Jones

reviews.title: BEST APP YET!
reviews.comment: I have to say this is one of the best apps I have used. It just seems to work the way you need it to and the quality of the image is wonderful. I am using on a Samsung Infuse. My thanks to the developer.... keep up the great work!
reviews.author: Mike G

reviews.title: Not bad for free app
reviews.comment: Its works perfect, but when I send a screen shot in a message, the image becomes blurry. Not sure what\'s wrong..
reviews.author: Erik Hurtado

reviews.title: FANTASTIC
reviews.comment: I was scared first time that I have to root but perfect! Its very very easy. Just download and start capture. 5 star!!
reviews.author: Hassan Tanvir

reviews.title: Easy and works
reviews.comment: Setting up was a small task, but once it\'s done, it\'s worth it!! Not 5 stars because I hear the click and then it takes about 10 seconds before it finally takes the pic... But its a great app!
reviews.author: Megan Heid

reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
reviews.comment: Great app and worth the cost. Instructions and tutorial were well written and app is working flawlessly... at least so far ;)
reviews.author: Josh Spink

reviews.title: Amazing! Worth the price!
reviews.comment: I refuse to get an iPhone but I love their snapshot feature.  Thankfully I won\'t have to worry because of this app. Get this app!! Easy installation!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good, but it needs some work!
reviews.comment: I love the app but every time my phone restarts I have to re enable it. Other than that It takes really good photos.
reviews.author: Shiesha Stokes

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: The app works as adsvertised with like a 1/2 a dozen ways to activate it...shake it, create a custom button or have it in ur dropdown & adjust the photo delay if u wish.  Also I recently had my samsung G S strat crash & lost the app, the phone would not let me set my original email as the primary (thankfully this is the only app I\'ve ever paid for) & the developer allowed me to redownload and then a refund (well he said he refunded it...if he didnt then there will be an addendum to this review..hahaha).
reviews.author: Rick Brown

reviews.title: F*cm YES!
reviews.comment: This app worked perfectly. Just make sure ya follow the directions carefully and read everything its worth it
reviews.author: Matt Millard

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Just got this had a issue with getting it set up i email Edward and help me get it set up so yeah five star and o would buy more apps from him just cause of the customer service
reviews.author: margo smit

reviews.title: Very Nice.....
reviews.comment: I downloaded this app it didn\'t work but edward helped me untill it did... works great, simple to use very helpful....Kudos to the developer of this app... for working with me and didn\'t scam me....
reviews.author: john Papi

reviews.title: Awesome app! Galaxy note 2
reviews.comment: A must have for every phone! Works great and super easy too. Developer answered my questions and helped me when I was in a bind. Great customer service! Worth every penny.
reviews.author: Robin Neeley

reviews.title: Difficult at first
reviews.comment: I can\'t get an iPhone so I decided to buy this application. If you do not have the USB drivers for your phone installed on your computer, this application can be very difficult to get up and running.  Other than that, great app!  I can easily share all of my screenshots! \303\234
reviews.author: Camille Webb

reviews.title: Small Problem with image format.
reviews.comment: I have the save format set to jpeg,  because of issues with other app.  It will only save in png format. Please fix. Only gave 4 stars because of the bug.
reviews.author: jason newman

reviews.title: Perfect!!
reviews.comment: I didn\'t have to hook my phone up to my computer to use this app at all, which was a problem I had on my old phone. Now, I just have to hold the \"power\" and \"home\" buttons and it takes it! Best app I\'ve tried. Absolutely worth it!
reviews.author: Chyna A.

reviews.title: Pros and cons.
reviews.comment: Its a good app. The only thing I hate is, to keep my phone fresh I will restart it which means I have to redo the process. Stupid in my opinion. Good app,  poor development.
reviews.author: Colben Yoder

reviews.title: Timing
reviews.comment: I made the app do \'no delay\' but it still takes like 10 extra seconds to take the screenshot, still lets you do a lotta good stuff with the app overall
reviews.author: Donald Cameau
